name: Final Horizon
description:
Final Horizon is a fast paced action packed strategic tower defense game like you've never seen before. Space Invaders just turned nasty.

Build and upgrade your defenses to fight off the Swarm invaders. Research weapon upgrades to level up with deadly effect. Build up enough kills to unleash one of the five powerful kill-streak attacks.

Fight the Swarm across 3 solar systems, 15 planets and over 50 levels. Replay missions and complete over 100 objectives to earn a Platinum Trophy.

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
1024KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
